[align=center][IMG]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/431.png[/IMG][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=777383][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/headlines-hacker.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Your Trusted Members[/color][/b]
A new feature has been added to the Market CP. It enables you to mark other members as "Trusted." This is for one's particular use to list trusted members. Currently, this feature is restricted to [b][color=#AFAAAA]r00t[/color][/b] and [b][color=#2D7E52]V3ndor[/color][/b] members only. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5952921]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Vendor Application[/color][/b]
Members who want to apply for [b][color=#2D7E52]V3ndor[/color][/b], now have to go through an application process. A particular page has been made for the same. Once you've applied, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] will Approve/Deny your application on the basis of your Market Activity, B-Rating, and other factors. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5952926]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]r00t and 3p1c Deleted[/color][/b]
After considering a lot about HF groups, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] eventually deleted [b][color=#AFAAAA]r00t[/color][/b] and [b]3p1c[/b] user groups. Although, he made several amendments for the users who were in those groups to compensate. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5953786]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Ub3r Upgrade Available[/color][/b]
After a recent change with the user groups, HF Ub3r is back again. Now, you can purchase HF Ub3r as a 1 Year upgrade subscription. Those who were in the Ub3r user group before will retain their membership permanently. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5954114]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Free Ub3r Upgrade for 3p1c+l33t[/color][/b]
Those who were holding [b]3p1c[/b] and [b][color=#ffcc00]L33t[/color][/b] both will get free [b][color=#0066FF]Ub3r[/color][/b] upgrade permanently. Those who were [b]3p1c[/b] only will be moved to [b][color=#ffcc00]L33t[/color][/b] user group. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5954394]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white][s]New K1NG Usergroup[/s] *No longer the case*[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] recently created a new HF User group named [b]"K1NG"[/b] with a lot of features for a price of $250 annually. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5955885]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Donation Awards Swapped[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has removed the Star Donation Award and returned to some former Donation Award. Besides, he also added the $250 K1NG Award as a donation. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5957286]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]April Fools[/color][/b]
Just in case it wasn't extra clear, Edition 430 was an April Fools edition.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/sciencenews-saltpeter.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]First Four-Legged Fossilized Whale Found in the West[/color][/b] 
Peregocetus pacificus; which translates to, the traveling whale that reached the Pacific, has been proven to be capable of making quite the journey. Discovered for the first time on the coastal desert of Playa Media Luna, this prehistoric whale is not quite the whale we know today. For example, the creature had hooves on the bottom of its feet. It also had a boned tail, anatomically similar to that of a modern-day beaver. Discoveries such as this bring us closer and closer to fully understanding the intricacies of the prehistoric age as well as the anatomical structure of the superseding mammals.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.inverse.com/article/54611-ancient-whale-four-legs-peru]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Dubstep Saves the day[/color][/b] 
Skirllex's music has been found to have a seemingly unintended effect on mosquitoes. The self-titled track, Scary Monsters And Nice Sprites, is the offending piece. As far as insects go, sounds are extremely important as the team stated "In insects, low-frequency vibrations facilitate sexual interactions, whereas noise disrupts the perception of signals from conspecifics [members of the same species] and hosts," The track has been proven to cause female mosquitoes to attack hosts far less often when being played, meaning one day we could all be hearing wubs for an entirely different reason. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/newsbeat-47770982]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1171567][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/worldnews-pray.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Islamic State Loses Last of Its Territory [/color][/b]
The Syrian Democratic Forces proclaimed that the Islamic State had been defeated after their victory in Baghuz on March 23. The Islamic State at one point controlled over 34,000 sq miles of land in both Syria and Iraq. After the United States along with many other countries joined the fight and provided resources to the Syrian Democratic Forces, the group has slowly but methodically driven the Islamic State further and further back. Along with its claim over vast amounts of land, the Islamic State also ruled over eight million people during the height of their power. Bringing in billions in revenue through oil, extortion, and robbery, they were also an extremely well funded group. The Islamic State inspired and staged many attacks, including the Paris attacks in 2015. The Islamic State remains a threat due to the instability of the overall region, and there is fear that a similar group could form in its place after the forces leave and the remaining sleeper cells and other adherents regroup.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-middle-east-47678157]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]French Military Assists Police as Protests Intensify[/color][/b] 
On the 19th consecutive weekend of yellow vest protests against President Emmanuel Macron's government commenced, French military forces aided police in controlling the demonstrations. This came after shops and businesses were looted and heavily damaged following last week's protests. What originally started as demonstrations against the high price of fuel and the proposed fuel tax has morphed into a large scale revolt against the top 1% of the country. The protesters blame proposal of such taxes on the rich and believe the taxes to not be for the purpose of reducing greenhouse gases but creating more revenue for the corporations and their wealthy owners. Additionally, demands such as higher salaries, better Social Security and even the resignation of the president have all bee made. With no real end in sight for the protests, the damage done to businesses and cities is growing as some protests naturally become more unruly. The government hopes to control the damage and chaos by adding military forces into the mix as well as increasing arrests of protesters. 
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-france-protests/french-military-join-police-to-tackle-latest-yellow-vest-protest-idUSKCN1R40BR]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pakistan Calls For Peace With India Following Military Display[/color][/b]
As tensions between the nuclear-armed neighbors of Pakistan and India remain high, Pakistan has called for peace following a military exercise. Matters remain unresolved after about one month of high tensions between the two countries following a suicide attack that was claimed by a Pakistan militant group which killed over 40 paramilitary police in the Kashmir region. Following that, Pakistani warplanes engaged with Indian aircraft over the same region after Indian jets raided a militant camp in Pakistan. Pakistan downed one of the Indian planes and captured the pilot; however, they have since released him. Now, the Pakistani government calls for peace as the conflict has hit a wall and both countries have taken steps to make some amends. This is now the third time conflict has occurred in and around the Kashmir region between India and Pakistan. The two countries have warred with each other three times in the past century, and it seems that the issues, especially over the Kashmir region, remain unresolved. 
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-pakistan-republicday/pakistan-call-for-peace-with-india-as-it-shows-off-its-military-might-idUSKCN1R409T]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-mimikyu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum New Trailer released[/color][/b]
Keanu Reeves returns as John Wick for the third installment of the John Wick franchise. John Wick is on the run for killing a member of the international assassin's guild and being hunted down by bounty hunters for a $14 million bounty he has on his head. The title of the film was taken from the famous quote "Si vis pacem, para bellum" which translates from Latin to "if you want peace, prepare for war." The film is set to hit theaters May 17, 2019.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pU8-7BX9uxs] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Stranger Things 3 Coming in July[/color][/b]
Netflix released a new trailer for the third season of Stranger Things. There will be 8 episodes for this season of Stranger Things. If you haven't seen Stranger Things before, then watch the first two seasons on Netflix before you watch this one. Stranger Things 3 is set to be released on July 4, 2019. So not only do you get to enjoy a nice Fourth of July kicking back with family and friends, drinking beer and watching fireworks, but you get to end the night by watching Stranger Things 3, only on Netflix.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nme.com/blogs/tv-blogs/stranger-things-season-3-release-date-trailer-plot-2127430]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Avengers: Endgame Deadpool Parody Trailer[/color][/b]
A YouTube channel by the name "Mightyraccon!" created a video where some clips of Deadpool appear in the scenes of the recent Avengers Endgame trailer. The YouTube channel shouts out his friends in the comments of the video which helped him create this entertaining parody. It's a pretty funny video I must say, even the commentary is spot on. If you need something to laugh at, you should definitely check this out.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QjjkStofi3Q] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Coachella Fest 2019[/color][/b]
The 2019 Coachella festival is upon us and will be kicking off on April 12, 2019. The lineup for this year may not be the very best according to most people including myself, but the festival itself is always a good time. People from all over the globe attend this festival every year for 2 weekends of partying, live music and entertainment. Weekend one will range from April 12 to April 14. The second weekend of the festival will begin on April 19 and end on April 21. It also seems like "national weed day" (4/20) will take place during the festival this year. The weekend after both Coachella Fest weekends have concluded there will be yet another music festival which also comes around every year right after Coachella fest, and that is known as Stagecoach, a country music festival. If you are planning on attending Coachella, please be advised it is located in Indio, California, which is the low desert. And yes, it gets very hot here so make sure to bring lots of water, sunscreen and stay hydrated out there![i][size=x-small][url=https://www.coachella.com/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Toy Story 4[/color][/b]
Most of us have seen the original Toy Story as it was part of a lot of our childhoods, Toy Story was one of my favorite animated movies of all time. As a kid, I would watch it over and over again, and I would never get tired of it. Now, they are making a fourth movie, and it looks great. From the looks of it, a new child in the story named Bonnie creates herself a new friend or "toy" out of a spork, some googly eyes and some pipe cleaners. Nonetheless, it seems to be the child's favorite toy. Woody introduces the new toy to the rest of the crew, and he tries to keep it safe, making sure the new toy doesn't get lost. As seen in the trailer, they seem to get lost, and a new adventure begins. I am looking forward to this new movie which is set to be out in theaters on June 21, 2019.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wmiIUN-7qhE]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Ownage Pranks - Lowballing an Asian Lady for Coachella Tickets[/color][/b]
How many of us here are familiar with the famous YouTuber and prank caller, Ownage Pranks? His most recent video dropped, and it has to do with trying to lowball some Coachella tickets he came across that was set for sale on Craigslist. Throughout the video, he is trying to get the lady to sell him the Coachella tickets for a ridiculously low price. But according to the seller, she already got a buyer from eBay for $1140, but they haven't shipped out the tickets yet. As Ownage continues to try and low ball them, the lady asks for $12k for the tickets. The reactions in these videos are always great. Ownage Pranks is always a good YouTuber to watch whenever you're bored. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LLqgRMewpYE]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3601559][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-nightmare.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]My Hero Academia Manga Gets 2nd Anime Film in Winter[/color][/b]
AnimeJapan 2019's stage event for the anime of Kohei Horikoshi's My Hero Academia manga announced on Saturday that there will be a new Anime Film that will premiere in Japan this Winter. Horikoshi will have overall supervision of the film as he did with the previous film "My Hero Academia: Two Heroes". The My Hero Academia: Two Heroes" film opened in Japan on August 3rd, and earned 500,320,000 yen (about $4.49 million) in the first three days. It's made more than 1.64 billion yen (about $14.47 million) at the Japanese box office since release.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-22/my-hero-academia-manga-gets-2nd-anime-film-in-winter/.144780]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Baki Anime Gets 2nd Season on Netflix[/color][/b]
Akita Shoten's Weekly Shonen Champion magazine announced on Wednesday that the production for a second season of the New Baki Anime by Keisuke Itagaki manga has been confirmed. Once again, Netflix will be the exclusive first venue to receive the New Season. Netflix premiered the First Season on June 25th inside Japan, which ran 26 episodes ending on December 17th. Netflix debuted the first 13 episodes outside of Japan on December 18th, followed by the second half of the season the following Tuesday. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-19/new-baki-anime-gets-2nd-season-on-netflix/.144725]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Netflix Adds Evangelion Anime Worldwide on June 21[/color][/b]
During their stage event at AnimeJapan 2019, Netflix announced that it will debut Hideaki Anno and Gainax's Neon Genesis Evangelion television anime on June 21st worldwide. While Netflix's original announcement last November stated they'd also add Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth, andNeon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion films, they did not specify if they'd be available at the same time as the series on June 21st. The original anime and films are of the most influential and critically acclaimed works in the history of the medium, but has been out of print and unavailable in North America. The franchise has inspired many spinoffs, merchandise, and collaborations. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-03-22/netflix-adds-evangelion-anime-worldwide-on-june-21/.144890]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]How much experience do you have in any form of hacking? What is your "expertise?"[/size][/i][/color][/align]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"That's a pretty big question. I would say I've had a fair amount of hacking experience. Most of it comes in the form of working as "blue team" and trying to break into my own infrastructure. As for my expertise, most people would probably say that I excel in cryptography and password analysis."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Mainly the basics."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"It’s not allowed on HF anymore, network stressers."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

      

[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]When did you get your first computer? What kind of computer was it?[/size][/i][/color][/align]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Oh god, I don't think I have the memory for this one. I think it was an IBM-Lenovo laptop that my friend's sister gave me when I was probably 12 - 13. It had 64 MB of ram and was running either windows 3.1 or windows 95. I remember trying to install XP on the machine a year or two down the line and having issues with it not detecting all 64 MB of ram and not letting the installer go through. Not quite sure what happened to the laptop after that."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"My first computer was an older Toshiba Satellite Laptop."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"It was a Acer with Windows 95, was our family’s computer."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

      

[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Other than hacking, what interesting or unique skill do you have? How did you get good at it?[/size][/i][/color][/align]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Well, before I got into computer science I wanted to be a mechanic. My father was a boat mechanic, so he showed me how to work on all kinds of different engines. When I was 10 - 11 years old, he brought home three destroyed Briggs and Stratton lawnmower engines for me and my buddy Nathan to take apart and mess around with. After a few days of Frankensteining them together, we managed to get one to work and I was instantly hooked."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Web design and software engineering/programming. I just learn from tutorials and videos I've watched throughout time."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Building things to perfection, only one real thing I’m good at."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]
